Cell.Data: Ballistic Pistol: Pistols are single-handed weapons with the same damage output and fire costs as rifles, but with shorter range. They are primarily useful as a sidearm for units equipped with precision rifles or heavy weapons, or when a unit has only one hand free (e.g. if they are carrying a combat shield in the other hand). Their 1.5x reaction fire modifier also makes them useful for scouting - they are more likely to perform reaction fire and less likely to receive it. Range: 10 Damage: 30 Kinetic Suppression: 20 Suppression Mitigation: 0 Ammo Capacity: 15 shots Reaction Modifier: 1.5x Reload Cost: 15 TU Fire Modes: - 28%% TU 45 Acc x 1 shot - 40%% TU 80 Acc x 1 shot - 65%% TU 60 Acc x 3 shots

Ballistic Rifle: Rifles are versatile weapons with average damage output. They are effective at long range using single shots, but can also burst fire to suppress enemies or inflict heavy close-quarters damage. This makes them reliable weapons that do not excel at any particular role. Range: 20 Damage: 30 Kinetic Suppression: 20 Single / 60 Burst Mitigation: 3 Ammo Capacity: 20 shots Reaction Modifier: 1x Reload Cost: 25 TU Fire Modes: - 28%% TU 45 Acc x 1 shot - 40%% TU 80 Acc x 1 shot - 55%% TU 130 Acc x 1 shot - 65%% TU 60 Acc x 3 shots

Laser Pistol: Pistols are single-handed weapons with the same damage output and fire costs as rifles, but with shorter range. They are primarily useful as a sidearm for units equipped with precision rifles or heavy weapons, or when a unit has only one hand free (e.g. if they are carrying a combat shield in the other hand). Their 1.5x reaction fire modifier also makes them useful for scouting - they are more likely to perform reaction fire and less likely to receive it.
